players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Please be careful who you trust."
Bob: "I am not the mafioso. I was with Alice last night and can prove it."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
